sentences: Minu sõbrad on alati minu tugevaima toekeskuseks.
Tema ühed vahetult kõrvale hoiavad temast oma sõbra kaugel.
Oma kodu eest hoolitsemine on hästi, kuid isegi parimate sõbradele peaks andma ruumi.
context: Sõbra means 'friend' in Estonian. It refers to a person with whom one has a relationship of mutual trust, support, and affection. The word is used both in singular (sõber) and plural form here as the example sentences show.
